title: Woman of the dunes = Suna no onna
creator_credit: Hiroshi Teshigahara, Tadashi Ono, Kiichi Ichikawa and Teshigahara Productions
brief_description: Out in the sand dunes a woman lives alone at the bottom of a pit. One day the local villagers bring a man to her. He can’t escape; gradually the two are drawn to each other. Out of this bizarre, if simple situation, Teshigahara builds an atmospheric, highly charged and remarkably sensual exploration of the human condition.
